200.description: Latest data about COVID-19 for selected country

get.description: Get latest data for specific country. Country name and format are in parametars.

200.description: Returns all countries with latest data about COVID-19

get.description: Get latest data from all countries.

200.description: Latest data about COVID-19 for selected country

get.description: Get latest data for specific country. Country code and format are in parametars. Country code is in ISO 3166-1 standard. It can be 2 chars (Alpha-2) or 3 chars (Alpha-3) type.

200.description: Get name name, alpha-2, alpha-3 code, latitude and longitude for every country

get.description: Get name name, alpha-2, alpha-3 code, latitude and longitude for every country.

200.description: Daily report for COVID-19 for selected country.

get.description: Get daily report for all countries. Date is mandatory parametar. Date format is by ISO 8601 standard, but you can provide different format with date-format parameter.

parameters.name: date-format
parameters.description: Date format. If you dont want to use ISO 8601 standard (YYYY-MM-DD), you can provide different format.

200.description: Daily report for COVID-19 for selected country.

get.description: Get daily report for specific country. Country code and date are mandatory in parametars. Country code is in ISO 3166-1 standard. It can be 2 chars (Alpha-2) or 3 chars (Alpha-3) type. Date format is by ISO 8601 standard, but you can provide different format with date-format parameter

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Country code. Country code is by ISO 3166-1 standard. It can be 2 chars (Alpha-2) or 3 chars (Alpha-3) type.

parameters.name: date-format
parameters.description: Date format. If you dont want to use ISO 8601 standard (YYYY-MM-DD), you can provide different format.

200.description: Daily report for COVID-19 for selected country.

get.description: Get daily report for specific country. Country name and date are mandatory in parametars. Date format is by ISO 8601 standard, but you can provide different format with date-format parameter

parameters.name: date-format
parameters.description: Date format. If you dont want to use ISO 8601 standard (YYYY-MM-DD), you can provide different format.

200.description: Data about COVID-19 for whole world

get.description: Get daily report data for whole world.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date of the report. If you don't put this field all dates will be returned.

parameters.name: date-format
parameters.description: Date format. If you dont want to use ISO 8601 standard (YYYY-MM-DD), you can provide different format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the response. If you don't put this field JSON will be response format.

200.description: Latest data about COVID-19 for whole world

get.description: Get latest data for whole world.
